The documentation for the package **NLPreadability** can be found in 
the package [vignette](vignettes/NLPreadability.pdf).
The companioning data packages **`tm.corpus.enTextbook`** and **`tm.corpus.OneStopEnglish`**
are stored on the [datacube](https://datacube.wu.ac.at/) (since they exceed the package size 
limitation of **CRAN**).
Information about the data in the companioning data packages can be found in the package 
README files 
([**OneStopEnglish README**](vignettes/ose_README.html) and 
[**enTextbook README**](vignettes/entb_README.html)).
